title: Salmon gravadlax with champagne mustard
description: Christmas wouldn’t be Christmas without gravadlax - this one comes with Champagne-laced homemade mustard.For this recipe you will need a pestle and mortar and a food processor.
ingredients: 2 large bunches fresh dill, leaves chopped
1 large salmon fillet, skin and and pin bones removed
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
